title: Work in Progress
text:
Welcome! I’m Patricio Pantaleo, a researcher and developer working at the intersection of science, open access, and web technologies.
This blog is currently under preparation — I’m setting things up to share updates, ideas, and experiments related to my work and interests.
Stay tuned, and feel free to explore my main site in the meantime.
